allow: Bash(python -c "import os; [os.remove(f) for f in [''index.html'', ''dashboard.html'', ''project_purpose.md'', ''ARCHITECTURE.md'', ''DEVELOPMENT.md'', ''i18n.ts'', ''nul'', ''public.gitkeep'', ''Dockerfile'', ''docker-compose.yml'', ''.dockerignore'', ''.editorconfig'', ''.prettierrc''] if os.path.exists(f)]; print(''Temizlik tamamlandi'')")
Bash(timeout 10 bash -c 'until curl -f http://localhost:3005 >/dev/null 2>&1; do echo ""Waiting...""; sleep 1; done; echo ""Ready!""')
Bash(timeout 10 bash -c 'until curl -f http://localhost:3007 &>/dev/null 2>&1; do echo ""Waiting...""; sleep 1; done; echo ""Ready!""')
Bash(timeout 10 bash -c 'until curl -f http://localhost:3003 &>/dev/null 2>&1; do echo ""Waiting...""; sleep 1; done; echo ""Ready!""')
